    \index{theia \textit{(package)}!theia.rendering \textit{(package)}!theia.rendering.shapes \textit{(module)}|(}
\section{Module theia.rendering.shapes}

    \label{theia:rendering:shapes}
Shapes module for theia, provides shape-calculating for 3D rendering.


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                               Functions                               %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

  \subsection{Functions}

    \label{theia:rendering:shapes:mirrorShape}
    \index{theia \textit{(package)}!theia.rendering \textit{(package)}!theia.rendering.shapes \textit{(module)}!theia.rendering.shapes.mirrorShape \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{mirrorShape}(\textit{mirror})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Computes the 3D representation of the mirror, a shape for a CAD file 
    obj.

    beam: beam to represent. [GaussianBeam]

    Returns a shape for a CAD file object.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{theia:rendering:shapes:beamSplitterShape}
    \index{theia \textit{(package)}!theia.rendering \textit{(package)}!theia.rendering.shapes \textit{(module)}!theia.rendering.shapes.beamSplitterShape \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{beamSplitterShape}(\textit{bs})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Computes the 3D representation of the beamsplitter, for a CAD file obj.

    beam: beam to represent. [GaussianBeam]

    Returns a shape for a CAD file object.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{theia:rendering:shapes:lensShape}
    \index{theia \textit{(package)}!theia.rendering \textit{(package)}!theia.rendering.shapes \textit{(module)}!theia.rendering.shapes.lensShape \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{lensShape}(\textit{lens})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Computes the 3D representation of the lens, a shape for a CAD file obj.

    lens: lens to represent. [GaussianBeam]

    Returns a shape for a CAD file object.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{theia:rendering:shapes:beamDumpShape}
    \index{theia \textit{(package)}!theia.rendering \textit{(package)}!theia.rendering.shapes \textit{(module)}!theia.rendering.shapes.beamDumpShape \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{beamDumpShape}(\textit{beamDump})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Computes the 3D representation of the beamdump, for a CAD file obj.

    beam: beam to represent. [GaussianBeam]

    Returns a shape for a CAD file object.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{theia:rendering:shapes:beamShape}
    \index{theia \textit{(package)}!theia.rendering \textit{(package)}!theia.rendering.shapes \textit{(module)}!theia.rendering.shapes.beamShape \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{beamShape}(\textit{beam})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Computes the 3D representation of the beam, a shape for a CAD file obj.

    beam: beam to represent. [GaussianBeam]

    Returns a shape for a CAD file object.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}
